data.actual_result: Content of some fields becomes 'mixed' / 'corrupted' until you re-open channel
data.short_description: Embed update with not yet cached image mixes fields content
data.steps_to_repro: - Have bot that can send and update embeds (in my example it's my own bot Snowball; I can send you link to the testing server, pls DM) - Send embed and after some time update it with some fields content - Next update push should contain thumbnail or image (?) that wasn't cached on Discord servers yet (?)
